Seriously, whatâ€™s going on with this app? The "Pay to Beneficiary" option is completely disabled for Android users, yet iOS users get full access without restrictions. Why are Android users being treated like second class customers? Itâ€™s the same app, the same service, but clearly not the same experience. This kind of platform bias is unacceptable, either give everyone the same features or be transparent about why youâ€™re limiting functionality. Right now, it just feels unfair and frustrating.

The app has a nice design and useful features like balance check and transfers, but itâ€™s unstable and often fails to connect. It also forces users to turn off Developer Options, which is unnecessary â€” other banking apps work fine without that. Many people use Developer Mode for normal reasons. Please fix performance issues, remove this restriction, and add biometric login for better security and convenience
